title: Merge validated branches and confirm Kanban UI is operational
description: This task unifies the disconnected worktrees by merging the 5 feature branches validated via the meta-agent. It confirms that the Planning tab renders, loads tasks, and can launch Claude sessions. It marks the completion of the bootstrap paradox and initiates recursive planning.
